content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 0, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 0, Barcelona 1.
Foul by Manu Trigueros (Villarreal).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, Barcelona. Jeremy Mathieu tries a through ball, but Neymar is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Neymar (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Dani Alves with a cross.
Attempt missed. Luciano Vietto (Villarreal) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Attempt missed. Manu Trigueros (Villarreal) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Tomás Pina.
Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box. Assisted by Mateo Musacchio with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Attempt blocked. Luciano Vietto (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Goal!  Villarreal 0, Barcelona 1. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Neymar.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Víctor Ruiz.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Substitution, Barcelona. Xavi replaces Rafinha.

Substitution, Barcelona. Sandro Ramírez replaces Pedro.
Substitution, Villarreal. Javier Espinosa replaces Cani.
Attempt blocked. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range is blocked.
